tool_description: An API which gives you access to OpenSea's GraphQL API. Simple and efficient.
name: OpenSea GraphQL API
title: OpenSea GraphQL API

api_list.name: OpenSea-REST
api_list.description:
Fetch a opensea GraphQL payload and a signed query, and parse the signed query in the headers, and the payload as json data.

Read the full tutorial on the tutorial section of this API.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://opensea-graphql-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "opensea-graphql-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://opensea-graphql-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "opensea-graphql-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
